author: juan_carlos1218
comment: #thecommuter #thecommutermovie #liamneeson #verafarmiga #patrickwilson #jaumecolletserra Insurance salesman Michael is on his daily commute home, which quickly becomes anything but routine. After being contacted by a mysterious stranger, Michael is forced to uncover the identity of a hidden passenger on the train before the last stop. As he works against the clock to solve the puzzle, he realizes a deadly plan is unfolding, and he is unwittingly caught up in a criminal conspiracy that carries life and death stakes for everyone on the train. #imdb #impawards #movieposter #movieposters #studiocanal #lionsgate #ombrapictures #thefilmcompany #amazonpride

author: millanfinity
comment: Ayer subí en mi canal que esta en la descripción, EL PASAJERO una pelicula de Jaume Collet-Serra protagonizada por Liam Neeson. Sinopsis: Cuenta la historia de un hombre que cada dia hace siempre lo mismo, ir en tren al trabajo y del tren a casa, pero un dia se topará con una persona que le dara mucho dinero si encuentra a alguien no habitual en el tren por que a robado algo muy importante, y el decidirá si lo hace o no. ¿Es buena? ¿Merece la pena ir al cine a verla? Para saberlo ve al video que te he comentado, ya sabes en el canal Millanfinity🍿🎥🎬 #pasajero #elpasajero #thecommuter #liamneeson #accion #thriller #jaumecolletserra

author: live4_n0regret
comment: #커뮤터 #thecommuter . . . 정말 제대로 된 액션영화를 본 느낌. 오리엔트특급살인과 비슷한 추리의 느낌이 들었지만, 개인적으론 커뮤터가 더욱 추리적인 느낌이 강하면서 긴장감이 더 많이 돈 것같았음. 처음은 조금 지루하단 느낌을 받았지만, 어느 순간부터 긴장된 나를 발견함. 정말 대형액션느낌 너무나도 좋았음. 추리과정이나 결과도 너무 만족스러워서 정말 기대안하고 봤는데 재밌었음.

author: omarakkad
comment: L’uomo sul treno di Jaume Collet-Serra Un film d’azione, per certi versi classico, le cui caratteristiche rientrano pienamente nel filone di film d’azione. Il protagonista è il solito uomo, arrivato per certi versi al limite (con l’età e le sue vicissitudini private), dalla moralità inflessibile e con capacità fuori dal normale, che si ritrova a dover salvare le vite dei passeggeri di un treno. Per certi versi dunque è un film classico senza grosse sorprese, qualche caratteristica leggermente curiosa, però, la troviamo: una fotografia ben curata con inquadrature di primi piani e di particolari molto ben fatte e la presenza di una regia che prova tramite qualche trucchetto e stratagemma a farsi un po’ furba. Lo sviluppo della trama è molto ordinato e procede in modo lineare e semplice per gran parte del film , così come il treno in questione, fino a poco prima del finale dove sia il racconto, che il treno, escono un po’ dai binari per un finale abbastanza originale. Una nota negativa personalmente l’ho trovata nelle scene d’azione, in cui si nota che Liam Neeson non è più un giovanotto e sente il bisogno di usare la CGI per certi combattimenti, cosa che rende le scene meno scorrevoli e fluide. In conclusione quindi un film d’azione carino che riesce a intrattenere senza alcun problema. Voto personale: 6 #luomosultreno #liamneeson #thecommuter #film #movies #recensioni #recensionifilm #cinema

author: moviemadness97
comment: The Commuter (2018) - 6/10 I really enjoyed this movie. Yeah its a over the top action movie but look this is what i want in a Liam Neeson action movie. It is like alot of Neeson’s other movies but its a movie you can just sit and enjoy and leave your worries behind. So you guessed this movie takes place on a train and with that you have a unique root you can take with the plot. Not quite sure why i enjoy movies that take place on a train ? Like i loved Murder on the Orient Express and then i really enjoyed this. The fighting scenes in this were surprisingly well editing and choreographed. Neeson can kick ass as usual. I like that Liam Neeson is trying to recreate a famous 80s movie ... first we had him in a Plane in Non-Stop, then we see him in this movie on a Train so I’m guessing we are going to see him in a movie where its set in a car. If you don’t get what I’m saying is the Liam Neeson is recreating Planes, Trains and Auto-mobiles. Overall its a really fun action flick that you don’t need to take seriously but its fun to watch. It stars Liam Neeson, Vera Farmiga, Patrick Wilson, Jonathan Banks, Elizabeth McGovern and Sam Neill. Its about insurance salesman Michael who is on his daily commute home, which quickly becomes anything but routine. After being contacted by a mysterious stranger, Michael is forced to uncover the identity of a hidden passenger on the train before the last stop. As he works against the clock to solve the puzzle, he realizes a deadly plan is unfolding, and he is unwittingly caught up in a criminal conspiracy that carries life and death stakes for everyone on the train. #thecommuter #movie #cinema #moviereview #moviemadness6

author: themoviehouse02
comment: My first review! 'The Commuter' was the first movie I saw in 2018, and I'll therefore review it first. The premise of the movie, despite being a concurring premise, is pretty interesting. The plot is pretty good and driven by Michael's (Liam Neeson) love for his family. What I don't like about the story is that the movie ends, and there is still some mystery and unanswered questions. Vera Farmiga's character feels purposeless at the end of the movie and questions surrounding her remain untouched, which leaves her being a weak character. The action is fine for the most part but sometimes the way it's shot feels too extra in such a narrow area which is a train. In fact, the best parts are when Michael investigates subtly, rather than when he engages in action. During his investigations, the main character makes some rather questionable decisions that make you wonder where exactly he's trying to reach. The performances are good, and Liam Neeson stands out as usual. Overall, The Commuter is an enjoyable movie but feels like there's a bit more left to see by the end. Rating: 68% (D+) #movie #movies #film #films #theater #cinema #thecommuter #thecommutermovie #2018 #liamneeson #verafarmiga #themovie #themoviehousereviews

author: cinesneek
comment: The Commuter Nu in de bioscoop! Taken-acteur Liam Neeson komt opnieuw in actie in de spannende actiethriller The Commuter. Michael MacCauley (Liam Neeson) is verzekeringsverkoper en reist dagelijks per trein naar zijn werk. Als hij onderweg in contact komt met een mysterieuze vrouw, wordt hij door haar gedwongen de identiteit van een passagier te achterhalen. Wanneer Michael zich realiseert dat hij gevangen zit in een crimineel complot, begint voor hem een race tegen de klok om het leven van zijn gezin en ook van zijn medepassagiers niet in gevaar te brengen. #thecommuter #liamneeson

author: lina8369
comment: Finalmente, sono riuscita a vedere L'uomo sul treno e mi è piaciuto moltissimo! Genere thriller, con un Liam Neeson un pò meno giovane, ma intenso e carismatico anche nei panni di un prevedibile assicuratore, che fa il pendolare 😊. La trama del film è incentrata su lui e sul treno, ovviamente. Il titolo originale è "The Commuter", il pendolare, probabilmente chi ha tradotto il titolo, lo ha trovato un pò troppo minimalista e ha preferito "L'uomo sul treno", che a me non piace; considerando, che abbiamo appena visto "La ragazza del treno". Comunque il film non ha nulla in comune con quest'ultimo. Michael McCauley, ovvero Liam Neeson, viene improvvisamente licenziato dalla compagnia di assicurazioni per la quale lavora da oltre dieci anni. Si sfoga al bar con un suo ex collega poliziotto e amico, Alex Murphy, con cui è stato in pattuglia per oltre sette anni. Poi, riprende, tristemente, la via del ritorno. La perdita del lavoro non era prevista, due mutui, un figlio da mandare al college e la loro situazione bancaria non rosea. Michael non riesce ad immaginare nessun modo per comunicarlo alla moglie e al figlio. Sul solito treno, più affollato di quelli italiani, i soliti visi, più qualcuno nuovo, tra cui una donna, Joanna, che si siede proprio di fronte a lui e incomincia a parlare: "Che tipo di persona è lei? Se io le chiedessi di fare una cosa piccola, la farebbe?" Da vedere!!! 👋#cinema #movie #guardolibrileggofilm #luomosultreno #thecommuter #film #thespacecinema #cinemachepassione #liamneeson #buonavisione #thriller #train #treno #lookingfor #mistery #greatactor #movie #buonaserata #carisma #action

author: ifilmofficial
comment: 'The Commuter' Now Showing on Bioskop . Dalam film thriller penuh aksi ini, Liam Neeson berperan sebagai salesman asuransi, Michael, dalam perjalanan rutinnya. Setelah berbincang dengan wanita misterius, Michael harus mengungkap identitas penumpang tersembunyi di dalam kereta api sebelum pemberhentian terakhir. Kemudian dia menyadari sebuah rencana mematikan sedang berlangsung dan tanpa sadar terjebak dalam sebuah konspirasi kriminal. Sesuatu hal yang membahayakan nyawa dirinya dan sesama penumpang dalam kereta api tersebut. Genre : Action, Thriller Sutradara: Jaume Collet-Serra Produser: Andrew Rona, Alex Heineman Penulis: Byron Willinger, Philip de Blasi Produksi: Lionsgate Films, Studio Canal Pemain: - Liam Neeson - Vera Farmiga - Elizabeth McGovern - Sam Neill - Jonathan Banks - Patrick Wilson - Florence Pugh Like dan Tag juga teman nonton kalian... . . #CinemaBioskop #TheCommuter #ThecommuterMovie #NowShowing #hdyt19

author: david_marmolejo
comment: The Commuter “Next time, I’ll take the bus.” Juame Collet-Serra Every Liam Neeson film that is released, is bound to be a solid thriller. Nothing fancy, but entertaining, no matter what situation, you’ll root for Liam Neeson because of his skills. Also, because he’s a great actor, doing all with what he has to work with. From saving his family multiple times, to dealing with scenarios of life and death in puzzling fashion, on a plane and now on a train, it pretty much ends the same predictable way. The Commuter keeps you interested, you can guess the villain in less than five minutes of this film, but you’ll like to see it unfold. It’s Murder on the Orient Express in present time sort of. Worth a matinee or rental, hopes shouldn’t be high but it’s likable, just don’t expect much but a time killer. Clean sequences, ok cast, cheesy script, and Liam Neeson, that’s all anyone ever needs sometimes. #thecommuter #liamneeson #patrickwilson #verafarmiga #samneill #film #filmaddict #movie #movieaddict #thursday #particularsetofskills #juamecolletserra #thriller

author: it_reaches_the_soul
comment: We watched The Commuter in the #movietheater. There are a lot of people comparing this to Nonstop. I can see why, both are thrillers on forms of transportation starring #LiamNeeson, but #thecommuter has a better script and makes for a more enjoyable #movie. Neeson plays Michael, an ex cop that has been working as an insurance salesman for the last ten years. He rides the commuter train into #NewYork each day, but then he gets laid off. He gets some drinks with his old partner Alex Murphy (not Robocop 😂) played by #PatrickWilson. We also meet the police chief (#SamNeill), who Michael is surprised has risen that far. On his way home, a mysterious woman approaches him (#VeraFarmiga) and offers him $100K to find a person on the train. He’s desperate for money after losing his job and decides to play along. Little does he know what will happen once he finds the person. He begins to get an idea when he tries to call for help. People are killed and his family is in danger. It’s a good #thriller with some #mystery elements. The villains are very Machiavellian, but a huge corruption conspiracy is hinted and I like that we are kept mostly in the dark about it. It allows the villains motive to remain unknown. I also like that the #film subverts expectations on certain characters. It was solid and entertaining. ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️

author: movieviewer22
comment: Liam Neeson stars in this high octane action thriller about an ex cop, who while taking his normal commuter train to work one day, is forced into making a decision that could have deathly consequences if he does not comply. This is a perfectly watchable film. If you enjoyed watching Neeson kick ass in his recent action flicks over the past several years, films such as Non Stop, Unknown, and Run All Night then you will enjoy this one as well. Standard run of the mill action flick so nothing new or out of the box but a pretty entertaining watch none the less even if not quite living up to Taken status. Solid for a January released film. 7/10 #thecommuter #liamneeson #moviereview #film #january #action

author: babelkowa
comment: Dawno nie wstawiałam zdjęć biletów i ulotek filmów, na których byliśmy w kinie, więc dziś pokażę trzy ostatnio oglądane. "Pasażer" - nowy thriller z Liamem Neesonem. Widać, że Liam to już starszy gość, ale ja i tak lubię każdy film z nim w roli głównej. Film wciągający od początku. Były momenty zaskakujące, ale były też dosyć przewidywalne. 7/10, ale raczej słabe to 7. "Escape Room" - miał być horror, a wyszło nic. Akcji tam niewiele, klimat nijaki, nic mnie nie przeraziło, a momenty, które wywołały jakiekolwiek emocje podobne do strachu czy (niewielkiego) obrzydzenia, można policzyć na palcach jednej dłoni 🙈 Słabo 4/10. "Więzień labiryntu: Lek na śmierć". Mówcie co chcecie, ja mam słabość do tej trylogii. Każda część podobała mi się w inny sposób, ale tylko tę widziałam w kinie. Warto było. Efekty świetne, akcja przez cały czas trwania filmu. Perypetie bohaterów i to z czym się zmagają w tej części wzbudziły we mnie wiele różnych emocji. Pojawiły się nawet łzy 😂 Uważam, że to świetne zakończenie trylogii. 8/10 #cinema #kino #movies #filme #thecommuter #thriller #liamneeson #escaperoom #horror #mazerunner #mazerunnerthedeathcure #thedeathcure #dylanobrien #thomasbrodiesangster #greatmovie #tickets #cinematickets #lovecinema #cinemalover #withmyhusband

author: 4criticos
comment: Luego de realizar películas como “Non-stop” o “Desconocido”, Jaume Collet-Serra (director) y Liam Neeson (protagonista) se juntaron nuevamente para realizar otro thriller de acción. Y la fórmula sigue siendo más q satisfactoria. El film es muy ágil, atrapante y utiliza a la perfección la (prácticamente) única locación donde se desarrolla, un tren. Con escenas de acción en espacios reducidos, lo que favorece mucho a Neeson, y un guión que pese a algunos baches tiene buenos giros y sorpresas, “The commuter” consigue mantener al espectador enganchado hasta el final. Quizás la única mancha importante son algunas escenas exageradas e innecesarias sobre el final. Pero nada que una película de este género no pueda perdonar. Está claro que no hay novedad en la cinta. El tándem Collet-Serra/Neeson apela a una marca registrada en esta película. Pero haciendo esto no decepcionan. Al contrario, cumplen a la perfección la tarea de entretener. #4criticos #cine #cinema #peliculas #liamneeson #jaumecolletserra #thecommuter #elpasajero

author: shawttynattmovies
comment: Insurance salesman Michael is on his daily commute home, which quickly becomes anything but routine. After being contacted by a mysterious stranger, Michael is forced to uncover the identity of a hidden passenger on the train before the last stop. author: hk_review
comment: The commuter Casts: Liam Neeson, Vera Farmiga, Patrick Wilson 打工仔無啦啦被上司炒魷魚? 遇到不知明既大銀碼 會降下底線而換取金錢嗎? 電影情節十分精彩 編排都好緊湊 打鬥場面十分細膩加上快狠準 真係睇到都覺得痛 難得喺火車上打交最重要既係睇到一啲都唔頭暈 由The Conjuring, Ed and Lorraine組合既”壞人”別有一番風味 特別有種真實感既恐怖 替主角感到可憐 其實都係想平平安安咁生活 看著兒子長大 點知卻發生不愉快既事 自己覺得自己都唔係一個好丈夫好爸爸 演員演出相當好 良心與私念既矛盾 保護一個陌生人還是家人既決擇 最後反映到主角既良知，犠牲小我完成大我加上永不放棄既精神 #thecommuter #liamneeson #verafarmiga #patrickwilson #hkig #hkreview #moviereview

author: ifilmofficial
comment: "THE COMMUTER." (Still Showing on Bioskop . Cerita yang ditawarkan The Commuter relatif sederhana, hampir sama dengan film-film Liam Neeson sebelumnya seperti Taken dan Non-Stop — Liam Neeson diminta menyelesaikan sebuah tugas demi menyelamatkan keluarganya. . Meskipun premis cerita yang ditawarkan cenderung membosankan, tapi tidak membuat film ini kehilangan keistimewaannya. Penonton dibuat seolah-olah ikut berada di dalam kereta, merasakan ancaman yang ada. Apa lagi bagi para anker (anak kereta) yang sehari-harinya menggunakan kereta commuter line untuk beraktivitas. . Adegan action di dalam kereta juga cukup membuat jantung terpacu saat menonton film ini. Twist dibagian akhir yang cukup tak tertebak juga membuat film ini sangat patut untuk disaksikan, terutama bagi para penggemar film Liam Neeson sebelumnya. Perasaan kaget, tegang, dan naiknya adrenalin pasti akan dirasakan saat menonton film berdurasi 105 menit ini. Siapa yang belum nonton? Yakin ga penasaran sama film yang satu ini? Like dan tag juga ke teman nonton kalian! #thecommuter #cinemabioskop #nowshowing #moviebioskop #actionmovie #hdyt19

author: cool_cash18
comment: The Commuter (2018) Movie Review! 🚊 ________________________ Directed by: Jaume Collet-Serra ________________________ Plot: A businessman on his daily commute home gets unwittingly caught up in a criminal conspiracy that threatens not only his life but the lives of those around him. ________________________ Review: The first movie released in 2018 reviewed!!! The Commuter is another paired effort between Liam Neeson and director Jaume Collet-Serra. I really liked their airplane movie “Non-Stop”, and The Commuter is almost the same plot but on a train and Neeson’s character is more vulnerable. Let’s start with the positives. Liam Neeson is great once again here, chipping in a splendid performance and doing well in the action sequences. He may be getting old, but he can still pack many punches. The action is filmed quite nicely, not a lot of shaky cam and relying more on the emotional weight. You feel the punches and kicks thrown onboard the train. I also liked the sense of less atmosphere on the train, since it is an enclosed location. The camerawork and cinematography are great. Coming to the performances, I felt everyone else did serviceable. Patrick Wilson was fine, Vera Farmiga seemed wasted and a little off-key with her boring character, and Sam Neill was decent as the lead officer. Of course Neeson is worth making this movie enjoyable. The movie knows what it is, a simple thriller with a somewhat convoluted plot sadly. It’s never fully explained why Liam Nelson’s character is brought onto this mission. Into the negatives. There’s some really bad CGI in the nighttime sequences when the train crashes. The third act suffers with predictability to the villain, and the slow pacing can be felt. Overall, I felt The Commuter was a fine action movie, light on character development and stronger on entertainment value. ________________________ Verdict: ⭐️⭐️⭐️ #thecommuter #liamneeson #moviereview #movie #filmreview #film #theconjuring

author: the_cynic_critic
comment: My review of “The Commuter”- Going into this movie, my expectations weren’t too high. Working at my job for several hours prior, I was psychically and mentally exhausted, and I simply wanted to watch a fun movie that wouldn’t require me to use my brain too hard. With this in mind, “The Commuter” is exactly the kind of movie I wanted it to be, for better and (occasionally) for worse. Featuring frequent collaborators Liam Neeson and director Jaume Collet-Serra, this action flick is about a man named Michael who gets caught up in a criminal conspiracy while on a train after accepting a job that is given to him by a fellow passenger. Michael (played by Liam Neeson) is a pretty normal and unremarkable guy, with the films great opening segment showing just how repetitive (yet still enjoyable) his life his. Unfortunately, his life comes crashing down once he is inexplicably fired from his job, and he heads back home, sad and ashamed, on the train he has been on almost every day for the past ten years. Joanna (played by Vera Farmiga) is aware of Michael’s familiarity with the train and his recent firing, and uses these facts to give Michael an offer he can’t resist; for 100,000 dollars, he has too simply find someone on the train whom he feels doesn't belong. As Michael accepts the task, the movie kicks into gear. For a significant chunk of the movie, the pacing is swift and snappy, and I was captivated by the chaos that was taking place. Liam Neeson is to be thanked for my captivation, for he helps make Michael a very relatable and sympathetic character, which in turn makes one heavily invested in the fire journey he takes. Thankfully, this journey is well directed by Jaume Collet-Serra, who makes the action sequences very fun to look at and successfully allows the tension to pile onto itself. One fight in particular (involving an ax) had me on the edge of my seat as the fight neared its intense conclusion. Unfortunately, while this particular fight scene has a satisfying conclusion, the same can’t be said for the movie as a whole. (Continued in the comments section)

author: hesaidshesaidmoviereviews
comment: THE COMMUTER HE SAID: Have you seen the film Non Stop in which Liam Neeson plays a grizzled, Irish American lawman who receives a mysterious phone call and is challenged to find a mysterious passenger to prevent everyone from dying on the flight he is on? Yeah I’ve seen it too and I just rewatched the exact same film only this time it’s on a train and it’s called The Commuter! And here’s the thing - I enjoyed it...again! Taken was terrible (I didn’t bother watching 2 & 3) but it gave Neeson a new lease of life as an ageing action star and for the most part, his B-movie action films with this director have all been surprisingly enjoyable. This film also includes the best fight on a train since Sean Connery and Robert Shaw in From Russia With Love. One thing that’s really lacking in today’s cinematic climate is the mid budget action/thrillers of the 80’s and 90’s - where are your buddy cop movies? Your psychosexual drama? Your John Grisham adaptations? Your ticking clock suspense movies? Of late this is about as close as we’ve gotten to a straight up, fun B-movie and I’ll take(n) it. Instantly forgettable but fun all the same. SHE SAID: Imagine playing Cluedo with Agatha Christie on a train and Liam Neeson is your board piece: that’s The Commuter! The film opens with a sleek montage of mornings, giving depth to Neeson’s cop-turned-insurance broker backstory. His life immediately feels real, and we are ready to believe that he could and would wind up in one hell of an afternoon commute. Neeson is often an oxymoron: strong in stature but soft in manner. Here is a prime example, as he tries to locate a mysterious passenger while being framed as a hijacker who has seen Falling Down one too many times. We believe that he could beat a man using an electric guitar and that he could look like a nice guy while doing it. The Commuter is, to be fair, Non-stop on train tracks. And I’m ok with that. Next up, I hope Neeson and director Jaume Collet-Serra do a murder mystery on a cruise ship. They could call it Taken on Board!

author: plumageee
comment: 總要隔好幾日才有餘力整理思緒與照片，雨日午後與大學同學約在大學同學的甜點店，吃到伯爵戚風的時候是這樣的 (˶‾᷄ ⁻̫ ‾᷅˵) ♥️ / 抑鬱低落的解法是暴食。有時真希望我們別變得太好，一旦走遠就會邁向慢性痛苦。你的喜歡一點指標性也沒有，太可惡了。原來我也變成不小心碰到手、也可以淡定自如的大人了。話說回來，我們會那麼喜歡茶味的蛋糕，是因為富有大人的氣息嗎 🌿 （--- 少女漫畫般的ドキドキ劇場落幕 ---） / #縮小人生 #Downsizing 🦋 題材十分獨特有趣，反而更顯得可惜。故事雜亂、走向善變，提及的議題太多，最終只淪為隔靴搔癢，還不如以紓壓喜劇路線走完全程，實在很不喜歡刻意的政治正確。縮小的對比是挺可愛，但實際表現大小差異的畫面也不如預期多，就被預告騙了啦。 / #疾速救援 #TheCommuter 🚉 運鏡大加分，節奏也掌握得不錯。同為列車上的解謎，勝東方快車不少。 / ​#高台家的成員​ #高台家の人々 🏊🏻‍♀ 追完漫畫十分喜歡、也非常著迷於超能力題材！興致勃勃想說也來看個電影版，儘管光看選角就知道會失望。齋藤工不倫形象太深、怎麼看都不是王子！全數角色只有坂口、​​夏帆​還有萌貓義正合格。​與喜劇向的原作脫軌，角色也性情大變。​果然有些美好只存在於二次元。​ #foodporn #vsco #tbt #vscocam #ケーキ #プリン

comment: なぜ俺が？ . 【最新映画の予告編情報】 . #GAGA より公開 . #トレインミッション #TheCommuter . 《2018年3月30日公開 》 . . 本作は「ラン・オールナイト」や「フライト・ゲーム」の主演であるリーアム・ニーソンとジャウム・コレット=セラ監督が再びタッグを組み、彼らの作品をご存知の方は予測出来るかと思いますが、タイムサスペンスアクションの作品となっています！今回は走行中の電車の中を舞台として描いており、妻を人質に取られ100人の乗客から1人のある人物を探し出さなければならないという、絶体絶命の状況下でスリリングな作品に仕上がっているみたいです！🎬 . . 個人的に・・・ . リーアム・ニーソンと言えば・・・"サスペンスアクション"という定義が定着してますね(笑)そして必ず人質を取られ、時間との戦いを避けられないことが多いですよね(笑)しかし同じ状況下の作品が多くても観て飽きないのがリーアム・ニーソンの映画で、彼のアクションシーンや緊迫感を感じさせる表情はとても魅力的に感じますね。彼は今回はどのように事件を解決していくのかが楽しみです！🎬 . . #ジャウムコレットセラ 監督🎦 #リーアムニーソン . . #洋画 #映画好き #映画鑑賞 #映画レビュー #映画好きな人と繋がりたい #洋画好きな人と繋がりたい #ブロガー #おすすめ #日記 #記事 #ライター#フリーライター#映画ライター #moviecollection #movielife

author: cinefilexterian
comment: "Todo comienza como cualquier trama de intriga, en la que sabes que las cosas no van a salir bien para nuestro desgraciado protagonista, y a medida que van pasando los minutos, esa intriga va cogiendo forma en tu estómago y en tu cabeza, creándose unas ilusiones, que van perdiendo un poco de fuelle, para aquellos impacientes adictos al caos y la acción empedernida, que no pueden pasar ni unos fugaces y necesarios “tranquilos” minutos, contemplando como lo mejor, está por llegar. Y llega cuando menos te lo esperas. Te pega un bofetada en la cara sin darte cuenta, dejándote sin respiración y las pulsaciones a mil, mientras contemplas escenas de infarto, en las que te tienes que agarrar a ti mismo o al desconocido del asiento del al lado, por miedo a salir disparado contra la butaca de atrás, si te alcanza alguna patada o bala perdida, en una trama que se mantiene intacta y sosegada, hasta que aumenta y estalla en mil pedazos, de brillante, y pura maestría cinematográfica. Jaume Collet-Serra, es un director, que sabe hacer películas, para toda clase de público, que lo que desea de verdad, es pasarlo verdaderamente mal, dejando de lado el género del drama, que ya se está repitiendo demasiadas veces, y que parece ser el único merecedor, de una inútil y clasicista estatuilla de oro. Jame Collet-Serra nos deja ver una vez más, que los espacios reducidos como un avión o un tren, son el escenario perfecto para desarrollar una trama explosiva, embaucadora y sobresaliente, que no deja a ningún espectador insatisfecho. Al contrario, nos sorprende, nos intriga, nos engaña, nos manipula, y sobretodo, nos hace saltar por los aires, sin dejarnos un solo segundo para poder tomar aire, pensar en lo que está ocurriendo y en lo que puede ocurrir, y darnos la mínima oportunidad para acomodarnos y poder detener ese tic nervioso que hace acelerar aún mas, nuestra tensión, que se va esparciendo por todos los capilares de nuestra piel." author: f_movieshouse
comment: The Commuter (2018) Michael (Liam Neeson) seorang sales asuransi berada di kereta untuk pulang yang merupakan kegiatan rutinnya setiap hari. Setelah ia ditelepon oleh orang asing, Michael terpaksa mencari identitas penumpang rahasia di kereta sebelum kereta berhenti di stasiun terakhir. Ia dikejar waktu untuk memecahkan misteri tersebut atau ia akan ditangkap karena terlibat konspirasi kriminal yang mengancam nyawa semua orang yang berada didalam kereta tersebut. author: moviereviews7
comment: The Commuter ~ PG-13 ~ 2018 ~ #JaumeColletSerra #LiamNeeson #VeraFarmiga #PatrickWilson #JonathanBanks #SamNeill #ColinMcFarlane After being laid off, a financially struggling businessman is offered the opportunity to find a specific person that doesn’t belong on his daily commuter train for a large amount of money. Okay, so I actually enjoyed this movie a lot more than I thought I would. Liam Neeson has had this stereotype ever since Taken where he plays yet another badass old guy in a mediocre, forgettable action movie. While The Commuter might still fall under that category, it definitely exceeded my expectations. Don’t get me wrong, there still are a fair amount of notable flaws. Character development was kept to a minimum, the acting was all relatively poor, & the third act is littered with an absurd amount of illogical writing. Regardless, this movie did what it’s main goal was: to entertain. As little invested as I was in the characters, the story remains consistent & fails to have a dull moment. The movie never takes itself too seriously, so I never really felt like the film was failing to do what it was trying to. I enjoyed the multiple scenarios Neeson’s character put himself in & even when the third act got a little over-the-top, I was still having fun. Would I ever watch this again on my own? Probably not. But I definitely didn’t find it to be the slightest of chores to watch this cheap thriller. 3/5 #TheCommuter #train #passenger #passengertrain #commuter #action #mystery #thriller #movie #film #moviereview

author: reviews_by_dean
comment: The Commuter is a movie starring Liam Neeson and directed by Jaume Collet-Sierra. The movie is about a man who is tasked by a woman to find a person with a certain bag going to a certain place and kill them. The movie is solid for the first two acts. It’s a nice action thriller with a race against the clock twist in an enclosed environment. It’s a fun movie, but with some odd “screw the upper-class” sentiments thrown in, but still solid. It brings good performances, and surprisingly good, but gimmicky direction. The third act, however goes completely off the rails, pardon my pun. It shifts the movie’s focus away from the interesting half mystery half action movie I was expecting, to a very overblown CGI mess. Without giving anything away, it almost shifts types of action movies to a completely different sub genre, and does some things that make no rational sense and may not even be possible. Another issue I have, is with the dialogue. It’s all very hokey and unrealistic. The attempts at comedy fall flat and the attempt at relating to the audience fails. All in all, it’s a perfectly passable movie, that is only accentuated by Jaume Collet-Sierra’s direction. #film #moviereview #movie #review #cinema #liamneeson #action #thriller #mystery #actionmovie #thecommuter #train

author: pipocandonoticias
comment: Filme: O Passageiro (The Commuter) . Estreia: Março 2018 . Sinopse: Neste intenso suspense de ação, Liam Neeson é Michael, um vendedor de seguros que vê a sua viagem diária de trem para o emprego transformar-se numa série de reviravoltas. Depois de ser abordado por um misterioso estranho, Michael é forçado a desvendar a identidade de um passageiro escondido no trem antes que este chegue à última parada. À medida que luta contra o tempo para resolver este quebra cabeça, Michael percebe que está preso no centro de uma conspiração criminosa, que coloca em perigo a sua vida e dos demais passageiros. — #opassageiro #thecommuter #liamneeson #verafarmiga #imagemfilmes #californiafilmes #geek #nerd #pipocandonoticias #cinema #embreve #comingsoon

comment: #thecommuter #film #movies #cinema #커뮤터 #영화 #메가박스 Insurance salesman Michael is on his daily commute home, which quickly becomes anything but routine. After being contacted by a mysterious stranger, Michael is forced to uncover the identity of a hidden passenger on the train before the last stop. As he works against the clock to solve the puzzle, he realizes a deadly plan is unfolding, and he is unwittingly caught up in a criminal conspiracy that carries life and death stakes for everyone on the train. author: katakinema
comment: [Movie Review] The Commuter (2018) #KataKinema . The Commuter stars Liam Neeson as Michael McCauley, an ex-insurance salesman who is confronted by a mysterious woman, named Joanna (Vera Farmiga), on his daily commute home. Little did he know that Joanna is bad news, now Michael is blackmailed into finding someone on the train, where not only the lives of his family are at stake, but also the lives of everyone on the train. . I like the action scenes, I think they are well shot and well choreographed. I also like the thrilling whodunit moments. What I dislike, however, is the movie is taking itself too seriously, while there a lot of implausibilities and a few plot holes. If it doesn’t take itself seriously, I think I might’ve ignored the flaws and enjoyed it a little more. In conclusion, this movie is an enjoyable and thrilling action movie, only when you don’t try to make sense out of it. But if you do, it turns into an enjoyable, mindless, silly, and thrilling action movie. . KinemaScore: 2.5 out of 5 . So, what do you guys think? Let us know in the comment section! . Happy watching and we’ll see you at the movies :D . [RI] ---- UK, USA | Action, Mystery, Thriller | PG-13 | Director: Jaume Collet-Serra | Writer(s): Byron Willinger, Philip de Blasi, Ryan Engle | Cast: Liam Neeson, Vera Farmiga, Patrick Wilson | English | 105 mins . You can watch it at your favorite theater. #movie #movies #film #films #cinema #review #reviews #moviereview #moviereviews #cinephile #instamovie #instamovies #thecommuter #liamneeson #action #mystery #thriller #verafarmiga

author: william1557
comment: [疾速救援the commuter]推理惊悚片是我喜欢的电影类型之一，通常在选择看不看一部电影时，我会先看这部电影的导演和主角是谁，最后才是预告来决定看或不看。 导演Jaume Collet-Serra和主角Liam Neeson他们在这部电影已经是第四次合作了，而这部电影有点像他们之前合作的电影non-stop的剧情套路，都是在不知缘故的情况底下卷入一场危机中。 整部电影除了开头的镜头切换有点混乱外，其它的都在水准之中，虽然没有什么惊喜，但还算是一部精彩好看的电影。 故事从主角失业后，搭上一班他每天上下班都会搭的列车，而遇到一名神秘女子。她告诉主角，如果他可以帮助她完成一件小事就可以得到十万元的奖金。 这件小事就是要主角在这列车上找一个人，线索只有三个: 1.这个人的名字是普林，可能是假名。 2.拿着一个包，包里有一样不属于他的东西。 3.必须在他下车前找到他，他的终点站是冷泉站。 #疾速救援 #thecommuter

author: movies_of_the_future
comment: Movies of the Future: Weekend Box-Office Results 1: Maze Runner ($24.1M) 2: Jumanji ($16.1M) 3: Hostiles ($10.1M) 4: Greatest Showman ($9.5M) 5: The Post ($9.1M) Last weekend Maze Runner: The Death Cure was the major new release and it disappointed. However with its overseas numbers, it's already over $100M worldwide, but probably won't beat The Scorch Trials total of $312M worldwide. Jumanji just cant slow down with an amazing 17% drop as it'll soon race past $850M worldwide. Hostiles had a decent theatre expansion with a $10M haul. The Greatest Showman continues to boast incredible holds, but it'll just fall short of $300M worldwide. The Post is also doing god business, compared to 12 strong and Den of Thieves which has significantly slowed down. The Shape Of Water expanded further and got some good results but $50M worldwide isn't that great.

author: lucilemalarge
comment: New formula for my cinema tickets! I'll post monthly my personal top (waaaaaaaay easier than each ticket on its own). Here is BESTS OF THE MONTH #1 Jan.18 : Best movies this month were The Post (Pentagon Papers in Fr), Darkest Hour and The Greatest Showman! For Darkest Hour, I wrote a whole critic on my blog (link on bio) and I want an Oscar for Gary Oldman! Then, The Post really got me by portraying admirable determined journalists. Then, huge coup de cœur on The Greatest Showman, been listening to the OST for a few days and I love Hugh Jackman singing and dancing. Then, Molly's Game was fine, interested characters and interaction between Chastain and Elba, but I wasn't that thrilled. Please, someone tell Liam Neeson to stop doing the same movies over and over again, The Commuter (The Passenger in Fr) was barely fine. Downsizing was pretty disappointing, just watch the trailer, all the interesting question are on it. Don't watch Fireworks, that Jap animated movie was way too much trying to be a new Your Name but meh you can't. And yeah I rewatched La La Land. Still don't like it. #cinema #LaLaLand #DarkestHour #LesHeuresSombres #MollysGame #TheGreatestShowman #Downsizing #Fireworks #TheCommuter #ThePassenger #ThePost #PentagonPapers #movies #january2018

author: cineviewid
comment: THE COMMUTER CINERATE: 7 out of 10 CINEOPSYS Michael menghabiskan hari-harinya hidupnya di kereta utk perjalanan dr rmh ke tempat kerja. Hingga suatu hari, kedekatan hidupnya dengan dunia kereta sangat diperlukan utk memecahkan misteri yang membuat Michael, secara tidak langsung, terjebak dalam sebuah konspirasi kejahatan. CINENOTES Film ini sangat menonjolkan Liam Neeson sebagai tokoh protagonis. Sempitnya ruang geral di dalam kereta membuat semua aksi Liam Neeson terlihat maksimal. Untungnya, Liam memberikan performa terbaiknya untuk film ini. Awal film ini sangat artistik, sinematografi yang memukau terasa kira-kira sampai 20-25 menit pertama, selebihnya tidak ada efek visual yang sedinamis awalnya. Film ini memiliki logika filmnya sendiri, terutama bila mau mengupas logiks konspirasinya, sehingga cukup ditonton dengan menikmati setiap adegannya. Ada banyak kritik di dalamnya bila mau berpikir lebih keras, tapi sebuah pesan yang normatif. Kesimpulannya, film ini adalah sebuah cerita yang sederhana, dikemas dengan konspirasi yang pelik. (JD / @cineviewID) #moviereview #ulasanfilm #filmreview #movies #film #reviewfilm #cinema #sinema #cinephile #instamovies #instamovie #instafilm #instareview #thecommuter #hollywood #liamneeson

author: sircritic
comment: THE COMMUTER: Director Jaume Collet-Serra specializes in entertaining junk, particularly entertaining junk starring Liam Neeson. These are the sorts of movies you enjoy while watching them, then forget about them almost immediately. This entry starts cleverly, gets particularly ridiculous with a very heavy, “yeah, right” quotient, then redeems itself with a finale so brazenly silly, I gave it points for chutzpah. For better entertaining junk by this director and star, see Unstoppable. For the best entertaining junk with this director, see The Shallows with Blake Lively. #thecommuter #liamneeson #sircritic

author: muxatinik
comment: Ieri ho visto per la prima volta al cinema il mitico Liam. Ultimamente ama far parti dove deve ammazzare gente e dove fatalità la sua famiglia è in pericolo 😅 Molti riferimenti sono stati fatti al film assassinio sull’oriente express ma non c’entra assolutamente niente. Anzi sembra dedicato al disastro che è successo qualche giorno fa a Milano. Un film a tratti lento ma che nel secondo tempo si vivacizza e diventa intrigante con molti colpi di scena. La regia usa inquadrature a volte troppo mosse a mio avviso, Liam sempre il migliore 👊🏻 VOTO: 7 ⭐️ #l’uomosultreno #liamneeson #irelandman #thecommuter

comment: #12 #thecommuter #疾速救援 (不要在意這個讚 感覺不知道被誰刷 我不喜歡這樣 這樣就只是數字 不知道為什麼讚會衝成這樣 自己也嚇到了 ) 在金錢女神的誘惑下 你會依然安份守己或是義無反顧呢 面臨生死家人的抉擇 家人的安全或是無辜者的性命正在激烈拔河 一顆心兩條線 完全的完全需靠自己的心來做決定 好口碑誘惑著我觀賞這部 不拖泥帶水的劇情 讓這100分出頭的片 不會過於冗長 當然也不敷衍 沒有謎片般的詭異結局和劇情 半懸疑半動作的組合恰似好處 雖然連叔叔已經拍太多類似型的片 好像救家人這件事已經非他莫屬了 看標題的 疾速 救援就知道 我不知道這樣算好還是不好 讓人有點膩 此片讓我想起前幾年他的上乘之作 #空中救援 緊張的節奏讓人停不下來 好了題外話結束 作為普通B級片算是極為出色的了 女主讓人意外的眼熟 回家Google發現原來是年輕厲陰華倫夫人 我覺得演非常的好 把開頭的懸疑開的成功 ##########雷分隔######### 主角是個剛被資遣的老員工 因兒子需就讀私立大學籌不出學費而煩惱 此時剛好在火車通勤中有位女士告訴他 如果他能在終點站前找到一位神秘人物 就可獲得一筆龐大的現金 但男主拿了頭款之後就馬上後悔 正準備下車時就遭到妻小綁架給警告 於是他被迫完成任務 經過一連串錯認和誤會終於水落石出 最終的最終還是自己信任的人在作祟 官商勾結真的是十分誇張離譜的事 最近都看到好片餒(魍美之前 #技術 劇情 2：4 特效(聲樂) 1：4 特效(佈景) 1：3.5 節奏 1：4.5 演技 1：4 娛樂性 2：4 其他(懸疑) 2：4 分數(*1.1)：40/50 %88分% #星等 ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ (8/10星) #Imdb：6.5 #RottenTomatoes #爛番茄：58% #Metascore：56 上映 107/01/12 觀賞 107/01/25 #cuttingtt #影評 #critic #movie #12thecommuter疾速救援 #action #thiller #drama #crime #mystery #動作 #娛樂 #驚悚 #犯罪 #懸疑

author: apolloundcentral
comment: . THE COMMUTER . Michael MacCauley (Liam Neeson) ist Versicherungsmakler und führt ein beschauliches Leben. Seit zehn Jahren pendelt er jeden Tag mit dem Zug aus dem verschlafenen Vorort, in dem er mit seiner Familie lebt, nach Manhattan. Doch eines Tages wird seine Routine gestört: Er trifft während der morgendlichen Zugfahrt auf eine mysteriöse Fremde namens Joanna (Vera Farmiga), die sich zu ihm setzt und ihn in ein Gespräch verwickelt. Nach und nach offenbart sie Michael, dass sie nicht einfach nur an Smalltalk interessiert ist. Wenn er mit Hilfe von zwei vagen Hinweisen einen bestimmten Passagier an Bord des Zuges findet, dann winkt ihm eine hohe Belohnung. Sollte er sich jedoch weigern, ist nicht nur das Leben aller Mitreisenden in Gefahr, sondern auch das von Michaels Familie. Ihm bleibt keine andere Wahl, als Joannas Spiel mitzuspielen - und er hat nur eine Stunde Zeit... . . #thecommuter #liamneeson . . #APOLLOundCENTRAL #apolloneheim #apolloarnsberg #neheim #arnsberg #sauerland #kinoneheim #nrw #bestepopcorn #kino #popcorn #film

author: ptothesmizzo
comment: #MovieChronicles2018 - January. This is something new I’m going to do. I’m not going to do individual posts/reviews for every movie I see because it seems excessive and unnecessary. I’ll still do a good amount of individual posts, just not for every single movie I see. That’s where these little monthly recaps come in. I’ll just share the movies and scores from the past month. Without further ado, here’s what I saw in January 2018: • INSIDIOUS: THE LAST KEY - 3/5 ⭐️ • DAY OF THE DEAD: BLOODLINE - 1.5/5 ⭐️ • THE COMMUTER - 3.5/5 ⭐️ • 12 STRONG - 2/5 ⭐️ • THE OPEN HOUSE - 1/5 ⭐️ • MOM AND DAD - 1.5/5 ⭐️ • A FUTILE AND STUPID GESTURE - 2/5 ⭐️

comment: #커뮤터 #영화스타그램 . . - #리암니슨 의 액션은 여전하다. 즉 발전은 없을 수 있지만, 유지하는 것도 사실 대단하다. 액션 영화에서 가장 중요한 것은 역시 주인공 캐릭터의 매력인데, 리암니슨은 하나의 공식처럼 믿고 본다. . - 액션 영화를 만들려면 이 영화의 각본이랑 연출을 그대로 따라만 해도 망하지는 않을 것 같다. 나름 잘 짜여진 스토리가 지루할 틈이 없고, 감독은 정말 영리하게 우리의 눈과 시간을 훔친다. . - 초반에는 편집이, 중반에는 연출과 촬영이, 후반에는 각본이 돋보인다. #자움콜렛세라 와 리암니슨이 다시 한 번 액션을 만든다면(비행기, 기차에 이어서 이번엔 배?), 난 또 보고 있을 것 같다. . - 영화를 평가할때 감독의 의도가 영화를 통해 얼마나 잘 전달되는가를 가장 중요하게 따진다면, 나는 이 영화에 망설임 없이 높은 점수를 주고싶다. 액션 영화는 그냥 이렇게 스릴 넘치면 되는것이다. . - #평점 : 7 . . . . #영화 #무비스타그램 #무비 #액션영화 #최신영화 #영화추천 #추천영화 #영화감상 #영화리뷰 #영화관람 #영화평 #영화후기 #추천 #감상 #후기 #리뷰 #영화스타그램🎬 #무비스타그램🎬 #movie #cinema #thecommuter #moviestagram #무비스크그램

author: the_honest_usher
comment: The Commuter Directed by: Jaume Collet-Serra Starring: Liam Neeson, Patrick Wilson, Vera Farmiga A man on his daily commute back home is approached by a stranger with a hypothetical preposition, and a reward that is not so hypothetical. The first thing of notice that makes this a clever and engaging ride is the editing and camerawork; films primarily set in one location can easily become repetitive and lack the ability to make the audience anticipate what will happen next. Here however the editing creates a quickened pace that moves the plot along and makes this film feel like its supposed to (a thriller). It also manages to convey visual story-telling in a way that is so effective it removes the need for exposition. The camerawork keeps the location from ever feeling too familiar, the varying use of close-ups and tracking wide shots are relevant to the mood of the protagonist; and this causes his motivations and inner conflicts to be easily displayed on-screen. Not that that would be an issue anyway, as Liam Neeson proves again that he is the best at playing an "everyday-man" who knows how to kick ass. The film has a strong cast, although most of the other actors and actresses feel like they are only in cameo roles next to Neeson, who to allow the narrative to work well, is mostly isolated for the majority of the film. The tension is well built and it comes from being able to easily draw empathy from Neeson's performance; that is his best since Taken. The narrative proceeds logically although it bares a lot of noticeable similarities to other films (many of which I can't mention because...spoilers) but despite this it manages to be better than the films it either draws inspiration from or is coincidentally parallel to. The only negative to be seen is the fact that Neeson's character appears to have John McClane syndrome, and can be put through a lot more physical trauma than what you would expect of a man of his age, it doesn't detract from the fun of watching Neeson in action again but it is rather prevalent, and does have an impact on the validity of the character. Overall, a fast and cleverly put-together train ride that gives plenty to think about. 9/10

author: framereel
comment: Next on the Liam Neeson's Transportation Conspiracy! THE COMMUTER Commuting isn't the most fertile source for interest when it comes to a movie, it's about a boring routine that you passionlessly do to get from point A to B. This film emulates all the thrills of commuting and resolves to meld them to an unnecessarily complicated plot. And, you know, it can be nice to take the train for the first time but once you've done it several times, it stops being refreshing. As so, if you see the same movie played out with slight differences over the course of a year, you lack that feeling of renewal - that's why John Wick's film are so appreciated, they bring something new. After having seen Non Stop and Run All Night, you can't help to be indifferent to the same actor-director combination, specially when the cuts, characters and plot feel the same, Jaume Collet-Serra's storyboard decisions feel the same and even the colour grading seems to gloom across all this transportation method trilogy. However, although it's completely uneventful, I didn't dislike The Commuter. There's a security in a commute like this where the elements are so played out that they are bound to work. Furthermore, there is one shot that is incredibly good and there is actual tension built around a premise, which many action films fail to do. It's like going to work in an office, it's a service and in this case, enough has been done to make it serviceable. It's incoherent but it has a lot of personal style, it's cookie-cutter but it is sufficiently well put together to make you actually care and feel some suspense for what's going to happen next. It's no Unstoppable or (for Hitchcock's sake) Strangers on a Train, but its main strength comes from the realization that the movie consists on seemingly one-trick pony of a star kicking ass in yet another mode of transport. #thecommuter #liamneeson #verafarmiga #filmreview #filmcritic

author: obfilmreviews
comment: Here's a list of all the new releases that I watched this month with my ratings. 1) Three billboards outside ebbing, Missouri - 9/10 I heard a lot of great things about this but I wasn't expecting to love it as much as I did. This was the first film I watched in 2018, and I expect it to be in my top 5 come the end of the year. Frances Mcdormand and Sam Rockwell were brilliant and I expect them both to win Oscars. ----------------------------- 2) Molly's game - 8/10 I didn't know anything about Molly Bloom going into this, and I think that made me enjoy the movie more because I didn't know how things ended up for her. Jessica Chastain was brilliant and really owned the movie - there isn't anyone who would have been better cast. ----------------------------- 3)Coco - 8/10 It's definitely up there with being one of the better Disney films. I didn't know a lot about the Day of the Dead but having seen this I feel like it's given me a whole new outlook on death - I thought the movie did a great job showing off the culture and tradition. ----------------------------- 4)The Commuter - 7/10 Liam Neeson on public transport fighting to keep his family alive. You knew exactly what you're going to get and it didn't disappoint. ----------------------------- 5) The Post - 7/10 I thought it was well made and had great performances from Meryl Streep and Tom Hanks. However I found the actual story to be quite boring in parts ----------------------------- 6) 12 Strong - 7/10 Although the actual true story is unbelievable, I thought the film fell short of capturing this. However I thought the action scenes were great and it had some good performances, showing that they were just normal men that were sent to fight. ----------------------------- 7) Hostiles 6/10 Again another one with decent performances, and when there was action it was quite intense. However when there wasn't any action it felt quite dull and dragged on a bit longer than it needed to be ----------------------------- 8) Early Man - 3/10 I knew this would be shit and it didn't fail at that, was full of stupid accents that were there to make little kids laugh. I'm not even sure if I like football anymore

author: cinemaambravalperga
comment: "Altro giro, altra giostra!" Per dare più scelta al nostro pubblico cambiamo cercando sempre di diversificare la nostra offerta. Solo giovedì la nostra rassegna culturale con l'ennesima gemma di Haneke; cineasta geometrico, cinico, necessario. Nell'altra sala l'adrenalinico thriller con lo specialista Liam Neeson; una donna misteriosa, un treno affollato, una corsa contro il tempo. Da venerdì recuperiamo l'ultima opera americana di Virzì con due protagonisti d'oltreoceano che da soli meritano il biglietto; un on the road atipico che solo il regista toscano poteva filmare. Domenica pomeriggio ancora un appuntamento con un papà particolare ed un figlio che lo scopre straordinario nella sua diversità; un'animazione europea capace di toccare un tema delicato con leggerezza e svago. Infine vi ricordiamo da giovedì a domenica in orari apertura cassa cinema la prevendita di "50 sfumature di rosso". The show must go on! author: infofilm.terbaru
comment: MY OPINION Paruh awal film ini berjalan agak lambat dg memperkenalkan tokoh2nya terlebih dulu. Paruh kedua bergerak cepat dg action khas Liam Neeson. Bila ada yg berpikir style film ini mirip dg film2 Liam Neeson sebelumnya, gak perlu heran. Soalnya ini adalah kolaborasi ke-4 Liam Neeson dg sutradara Jaume Collet-Sera setelah film "Unknown” (2011) ,”Non Stop” (2013) dan “Run All Night” (2015). Liam Neeson yg sdh semakin tua pernah berkata bhw ia tdk akan main film action lagi. Ternyata ia menjilat ludahnya sendiri. Tapi gak bisa dipungkiri, ia masih sangat pantas utk genre action. author: heechan_0521
comment: Ok,, let's talk about this awesome movie.! Wait2.. I mean it n it's not bcoz of my fav actor Liam Neeson but the hidden message on this film 🎬🎬 *I becomes his fans since NARNIA 1 bcoz Aslan voice is belongs to him * . I don't want to talk about this movie precisely but the 'thing' or message I got from this film.. As a human,, we may face something that we never expected to happen.. We do choose to live a very smooth journey by doing our routine every single day.. Unfortunately,, things will not happen the way we want but far away from our imagination.. Beyond it.! In just one 'click' our life turn upside down,, who's know.. Human do love money n if we r to desperate to earn money,, we might take any job or order that related to the money.. Human greedy sometimes not working out n most tense happen is we hv to sacrifice something in return.. It's not easy to get money bcoz we need to do something to get it.. Friend can be our closest enemy.. Family comes first. Always remember it.! How money changed ordinary person life into something extraordinary life with no choice but hv to do it.. About life, about family, about friends n about MONEY 💵💵 Money can destroy our whole life.. One word brings a lot of disaster is what we called,, M O N E Y.. . 💖💗 . #TheCommuter #Movie #LiamNeeson #GreatMovie

author: bomocili
comment: 🚇"The Commuter"🚇 /2018 Mein erster Eindruck war das Liam Neeson wirklich alt geworden ist🤔 Kein Wunder daß dies angeblich sein letzter Actionfilm sein soll. Anfangs sehr gelungen und spannend durch das Rätselraten, verliert er nach der Hälfte leider an Geschwindigkeit (aber nicht der Zug😉). Ein Handlungsstrang war leider sehr vorhersehbar. Das Ende hat mir gefallen😊 "Der Pendler" verspricht Flair à la Hitchcock kann das (und will das vielleicht nicht) bis zum Ende durchhalten. 🎬Drei Gründe für mich diesen Film zu mögen😁: Bücher, Zug und Shazad Latif. Außerdem bin ich selbst Pendler und da muss man schließlich mit allem rechnen😉😜 🚇🚇🚇 Jeder ist ein Kritiker. Darum gibt es von mir 3 von 5 Zügen 😊 #shazadlatif #thecommuter #liamneeson #kinoträume #aufdergroßenleinwand #cinemas #kino #kinos #cineasten #cineastenuntersich #cinema #cinemas #instacinema #kinosaal #filmhaus #instakino #cineast #movielove #cinemasecrets #kinofilm #lichtundschatten #mycinema #movies #cinemalove #ilovecinema #kinoreihe #kinoprogramm #cinemashelfie #cinematic #cinemashelfies

author: fmcrreviews
comment: The Commuter (2018) - 6.7/10 • “What kind of a person are you?” “Insurance salesman Michael is on his daily commute home, which quickly becomes anything but routine. After being contacted by a mysterious stranger, Michael is forced to uncover the identity of a hidden passenger on the train before the last stop. As he works against the clock to solve the puzzle, he realizes a deadly plan is unfolding, and he is unwittingly caught up in a criminal conspiracy that carries life and death stakes for everyone on the train.” At the beginning it was really confusing and slow, then it started getting better and better, developing the character more and setting more challenges. The storyline felt sometimes weird and without an actual point. The action scenes were good but everything seemed unnecessary, or overly exaggerated. The plot was a little confusing but the actors did a good job portraying their characters. It is overall an ok crime movie with some plot holes and the final rating is a 6.7/10, recommended. • 👇🏽Comment your opinion below👇🏽 • #movie #film #cinema #review #thecommuter #critique #fmcr #trains #crime #mystery

author: tikoltiketonline
comment: Michael (Liam Neeson) seorang salesman asuransi sedang melaksanakan perjalanan rutinnya. Ditengah perjalanan, seorang wanita misterius (Vera Farmiga) datang menghampiri dan meminta Michael mengungkap identitas penumpang tersembunyi di dalam kereta api sebelum pemberhentian terakhir. Michael kemudian menyadari sebuah rencana mematikan sedang berlangsung dan ia dijadikan 'alat' dalam sebuah konspirasi kriminal yang dapat yang membahayakan nyawa dirinya dan sesama penumpang dalam kereta api tersebut. 📲for booking : Line : @uyb3602n #thecommuter #thecommutermovie #thecommuterseries #thecommuterfilm #bioskop #tikol #tiketonline #bookingtikol

author: nhmmmhn
comment: THE COMMUTER 2nd, 1 week later, totally different from the beginning (the decision to go) on, inside and outside. The photos: All pics are taken by me myself AT/IN the cinema first before film, second after film (while making me fresh😅), third after leaving the building. Picreading always bottom up. The world I experience as a mirror happens HERE & NOW. My personal advice to me myself (I am still #kapitel4 #selflove 😉): Pls Nadine, do me a favor, listen again to Alan Watts' Let go of attachment (my “thought“ refers totally just part 1), and listen to it moment by moment, word by word. Feel the just happening moment in you. Repeat if necessary. This can happen quick. It needs full focus. Full. In every word spoken. 🙏 #ethnologyworks #life #now #live #cinema #kino #film PS: die Story ist einfach der Hammer, die Details auch, ich schau den mir noch öfter an, vieles geht einfach unter bei nur einmaligem anschauen. author: tiketxxibali
comment: NOW PLAYING THE COMMUTERMichael (Liam Neeson) seorang salesman asuransi sedang melaksanakan perjalanan rutinnya. Ditengah perjalanan, seorang wanita misterius (Vera Farmiga) datang menghampiri dan meminta Michael mengungkap identitas penumpang tersembunyi di dalam kereta api sebelum pemberhentian terakhir. Michael kemudian menyadari sebuah rencana mematikan sedang berlangsung dan ia dijadikan 'alat' dalam sebuah konspirasi kriminal yang dapat yang membahayakan nyawa dirinya dan sesama penumpang dalam kereta api tersebut. #thecommuter #tiketbioskop #tiketbioskopbali #tiketbioskopmurah #tiket #bali #ubud #denpasar #kuta #legian

author: 1.2.3.wtf
comment: 🚨🛑 Video has mild SPOILER ALERT for the first act🛑🚨 120 days in a row at the cinema! Today I saw The Commuter. Like a daily commute this is fairly routine and sometimes goes too slow, but it gets you there in the end. There are worse ways to kill time than this 90-minute ride. (Hint: go into this expecting a suspense film and not an action one and you'll say it's a pleasant way to spend a Sunday matinee.) Out of a possible 10, I have 7 Fs to give. #movie #film #cinema #review #thecommuter #liamneeson #verafarmiga

author: brisbanista
comment: The Commuter is currently showing in cinemas. Full review on the Brisbanista website. “The Commuter asks the audience, if someone asked you to do something that seems insignificant but you’re not sure of the outcome in exchange for a considerable financial reward, would you do it?” “That‘s the philosophical choice that our central character – a man of 60 who’s just been fired, has no savings and is mortgaged to the hilt – is faced with. Is he thinking just about himself or is he going to take into consideration the possible moral consequences of what he’s asked to do? That’s the question we want the audience to ask themselves.”

author: a_movie_critic
comment: "The Commuter" was another thriller by Liam Neeson and it does not disappoint in the cinema, but when you're done with the movie, you kind of reflect back on the things that didn't make sense but did while you were watching it. First: thing: The Plot. I was very intrigued with the storyline but it did turn out a little bit unrealistic at the end. The mystery to the movie was acceptable but some parts were predictable and the person who did not belong on the train was not expected. Second: the cast and characters. Liam Neeson was pretty good in his role and Vera Farmiga was ok, so was Patrick Wilson. I did like how Jonathan Banks was in it because he was amazing in "Breaking Bad". Everyone else was average. Finally: the music and editing. The action scenes were not well done and the original score for the movie did not blend well with the whole suspense and plot. The editing is not really something to appreciate because (SPOILER) there is a scene where the train is moving sideways for a long amount of time and that is impossible. This movie wasn't a big success in reviews it it is a fan favorite now which is why I am going to rate this movie with a 62%. Thank you guys for reading my review and I'll see you next time. Bye! #the #commuter #thecommuter #liamneeson #verafarmiga #patrickwilson #jonathanbanks #mystery #thriller #action #movie #movienight #moviereview #review #moviecritic #critic #university #nyu #chapman #syracuse #loyola #lafi #amoviecritic

author: j.vtone
comment: 人生就是會有突如其來的狀況，你（妳）該如何處理？沒有考慮時間，沒有別的條件選擇，下一秒都是關鍵。 果真是地表最強救援王！內容都很寫實，但看到一個時段我突然浮出「東方快車謀殺案」的情景，但最後的情節更是精彩。 多看看不一樣、自己可能不會嘗試、不接受的人事物，用心體驗，會有不同的感受，這你我都知道，但你會去做嗎？ #thecommuter #極速救援 #地表最強救援王 #開心的一天 #找回人性 #nexttime #隨機應變 #thx

author: yuseok1013
comment: #cgv #movie #film #phototicket #포토티켓 #다키스트아워 #원더휠 #커뮤터 #압구정cgv #명동역cgv #명동역씨네라이브러리 - 일찍 일어나기 힘들다. - <다키스트 아워> : 사실 지난주 개봉작인데 시간이 안 맞아 못보다 이제서야 관람. 작년 개봉작인 덩케르크의 프리퀄 같은 역할을 하고 있다. 이 영화는 외부보단 내부 위주로 보여주고 있다. 덩케르크를 재밌게 봤다면 이 작품도 즐길 수 있을 듯. 하지만 보통의 전쟁 영화를 기대한다면 비추천. 게리 올드만의 연기야 굳이 말할 필요가 없고 #릴리제임스 예쁨. - <원더 휠> : 우디 앨런의 신작. 딱 보고 난 후의 느낌은 한국 영화 중에 고령화 가족을 본 것 같았다. 그냥 말 그대로 콩가루 패밀리. 여기 나오는 인물 중 어느 누구도 쉽게 공감할 수 있는 캐릭터가 없었다. 솔직히 요즘 우디 앨런 감독 작품들은 아쉬움이 많다. 그래도 영상미 하나는 끝내줌. GV는 자주 다녔지만 큐레이터 프로그램은 처음이었는데 끝나고 해설을 들어보니 나름 고대 문학과도 연관이 많은 작품이었다는 걸 깨달았다. - <커뮤터> : 이제는 그냥 액션배우 리암 니슨의 액션 영화. 킬링타임으론 나쁘지 않다. 그런데 이제는 그의 액션 영화의 피로도가 누적되서인지 뭘 봐도 비슷해 보인다는 단점이 있다. 리암 니슨과 가족이 되면 일단 인질이 되는 건 기본 옵션일 듯. 이제 액션은 쉬세요..

author: cinemahi
comment: #thecommuter . . ملخص الفلم ⬇️ . مايكل وولريتش (ليام نيسون) موظف تأمينات، يخرج يوميًا في رحلة عمله التي باتت روتينًا بالنسبة له. تتغير الأمور حين يتلقى اتصالًا غامضًا من غريب لا يعرفه، ويصبح مايكل مضطرًا للكشف عن هوية الراكب المتخفي بالقطار - الذي يقله لعمله - قبل بلوغ المحطة الأخيرة. وبينما يسابق الزمن لحل اللغز، يكتشف أن هناك خطة قاتلة تُحاك وأنه سيتورط في مؤامرة جنائية عن غير قصد، وبذات الوقت ستتوقف على تصرفاته حياة كل مَن على متن القطار. . #تقيمي : 3 من 5 👌🏼😍

author: grey_gravity
comment: . #커뮤터 관람🚆🔫 의외로 액션보다 추리/스릴러 분위기(오리엔트...?) 오프닝이 꽤나 인상적인데, 출근길의 리암 니슨을 여러컷 이어붙인 장면에서 도대체 주인공 직업이 뭐길래 저렇게 수트랑 코트를 멋지게 빼입고 출근하시나 했다😍 눈치백단이라 주요 전개까지 다 눈치챘지만 오락영화로서 몰입도와 볼거리는 충분! 약간 돈들인 미드느낌도 나고 🎸액션 내취향ㅋㅋㅋ 웃는 와중에도 멋있었음 흥행이 부진하다는 소릴 들었는데 상영관이 만석이라 놀랐다 소소한 조크들 덕에 관객들 리액션도 좋았고 후반부 열차 사운드가 소름끼치게 빵빵해서 극장관람 만족! 이제 식상할 법도 한데, 팬심인지 뭔지 리암니슨옹께서 계속 찍고싶은 영화 많이 찍으셨음 좋겠다 물론 더 다양한 작품에 출연해주시면 더 좋고😀 #커뮤터 #리암니슨 😻 #thecommuter #liamneeson #영화리뷰 #무비스타그램 #영화굿즈 #무비쿡 정말 감사합니다😘 #movie_cook

author: movie_newbie
comment: 커뮤터 (무난함) 비행기랑 기차 탔으니까 이제 배 타는 일만 남은거죠? - CGV에서 븨아픠 회원들을 대상으로 진행했던 서프라이즈 티켓에 당첨돼서 <커뮤터>를 무료로 관람했다. 근데 뭐 딱히 할 말이 없는 전형적인 킬링타임 영화라고 할 수 있겠다. - 매일 같은 곳을 왕복하는 통근 기차에서 일어나는 일을 다루고 있는만큼 그것과 연결하여 만들어진 오프닝이 인상적으로 다가온다. 마이클이 매일 같은 시간에 일어나서 비슷한 일상을 살아가는 장면을 콜라주로 연결하여 보여주는 오프닝은 짧은 시간내에 그가 살고있는 환경과 가장으로서의 모습을 효과적으로 드러내준다. - 관객들은 철저하게 마이클의 시점으로 무슨 일이 일어나는지 모르는 상태로 상황에 접근하기 떄문에 몰입감은 상당히 뛰어나다. 누가 프린인지 가방에는 뭐가 들어있는지 그리고 도대체 무슨 일이 벌어지고 있는지 전혀 감을 잡을 수가 없다. 그렇게 승객들을 한명한명 의심하며 일이 진행되지만 이상하게 <오리엔트 특급 살인>와 비슷하게도 긴장감이 전혀 느껴지지 않았다. - 이미 <테이큰>과 <논스톱> 등등 여러 영화에서 비슷한 이미지의 캐릭터를 연기한 리암니슨이 또 같은 유형의 영화를 찍어야 할 이유가 있어야 했나싶다. 특히 60살 먹은 노인이면 액션은 좀 빼주자 인간적으로... 팔팔한 20~30대랑 싸움을 붙이다니... 리암 니슨이 맞는 모습을 볼 때마다 안타까움의 탄식이 나왔다. <논스톱>은 비행기에서 이야기를 다루고 <커뮤터>는 기차에서 이야기를 다루고 있으니까 다음에는 <크루즈>라고 해서 배 타는 이야기를 다루면 될 것 같다. 지긋지긋.. 보고 계시나요 감독님? #일상 #취미 #영화 #영화알못 #영화스타그램 #인스타무비 #무비스타그램 #movie #film #커뮤터 #TheCommuter #리암니슨

author: kino_maglaj
comment: 🔺Michael je obiteljski čovjek i prodavač osiguranja koji svakodnevno s posla kući putuje vlakom. Jednog poslijepodneva njegovu sigurnu rutinu prekida misteriozna neznanka, koja ga obasipa intrigantnim osobnim pitanjima. Micheal, kojeg tumači Liam Neeson, susreće se s ponudom koju ne može odbiti te biva prisiljen identificirati skrivenog putnika, uljeza na svom vlaku, prije zadnjeg zaustavljanja. U bitci s vremenom pokušava razriješiti nametnutu mu zagonetku. Uskoro shvaća da je nesvjesno namamljen u kriminalnu zavjeru te da potpomaže smrtonosni plan koji se počinje odvijati pred njegovim očima. U Michelovim je rukama sudbina njegove obitelji i sudbine svih suputnika u vlaku, a u pitanju je igra života i smrti.🔺 #thecommuter

author: lololovesfilms
comment: MOVIE REVIEW: If you're willing to turn your brain off and enjoy yourself, #TheCommuter is a surprisingly good time. There is a lot more tension and excitement than we anticipated. Much of the action enters into over the top, "what the hell is physics?" territory, but let's face it, we don't seek out #LiamNeeson action films for their realism. The mystery has a little bit of intrigue, though it is not tightly put together and we never felt wowed by that aspect of it. The camerawork gets pretty shaky at times and the jump-cuts come a bit too often, especially in the beginning when. #VeraFarmiga, #PatrickWilson, #FlorencePugh, #JonathanVanks, #ElizabethMcGovern, and #SamNeill don't get anything to do, but Neeson still keeps the entire thing rolling with help from director #JaumeColletSerra. Our rating: 6.5/10! #moviereview #lololovesfilms #cinephile #cinephilecommunity See the FULL REVIEW by clicking the link in our @lololovesfilms bio/profile above, or visit us on the blog here: http://bit.ly/LoloCOMMUTER

author: csmavericks
comment: 아직도 액션스타라는 것을 증명하는 듯한 액션 '아버지', 올해 만66세의 #리암니슨 주연의 #통근자... 아, 아니 <#커뮤터>. <런올나이트> 에서도 느꼈지만 예전 테이큰때처럼 본격 액션으로 죄다 뚜까 팬다기보단 은퇴했거나 일선에서 물러난 역할로서 약간 힘겹게(?) 액션을 치르는 모습을 보여주는데 확실히 나이가 들긴 들었나보다... 싶은 스멜을 뿜뿜한다. 그래도 그 카리스마와 목소리의 간지는 어디 안간다~ 멋졍😎👍. 사실 포스터와는 '많이' 다르게 열차테러와는 상관 없는 것 같은데... 포스터 글귀는 누가 정한건지 참...😓. 권력자들의 권모술수에 껴서 가족이 인질로 잡혀 영문모르게 권력자들 똥 닦게 생긴 전 경찰 #마이클맥콜리 (리암니슨 분)가 그들이 원하는대로 움직이지 않으려 열차 안에서 발악하는 영화라 할 수 있다. 처음에는 전형적인 리암니슨 클리셰 (푹찍푹찍 푹억푹억)인 줄 알았는데, 그건 아니고 나름 공들인 듯한 스토리라인이 보인다. 그래도 왠지 반전은 보다보면 눈치까기 쉬웠지만 말이지ㅎㅎ. '노장은 살아있다' 라는 것을 아직 느낄 수 있던 영화였다. 언제까지 액션 찍으실지😁. #영화 #영화스타그램 #무비 #무비스타그램 #movie #moviestagram #삼성역 #코엑스 #Coex #메가박스 #Megabox #CoexMegabox #코엑스메가박스 #TheCommuter #LiamNeeson

comment: Sedang tayang di Bioskop "THE COMMUTER" (2017) #Drama #Crime #Mistery [D] . Jadwal jam tayang bisa cek di m.21cineplex.com Info pemesanan tiket cek @mtixbossinfo . Michael (Liam Neeson) seorang salesman asuransi sedang melaksanakan perjalanan rutinnya. Ditengah perjalanan, seorang wanita misterius (Vera Farmiga) datang menghampiri dan meminta Michael mengungkap identitas penumpang tersembunyi di dalam kereta api sebelum pemberhentian terakhir. Michael kemudian menyadari sebuah rencana mematikan sedang berlangsung dan ia dijadikan 'alat' dalam sebuah konspirasi kriminal yang dapat yang membahayakan nyawa dirinya dan sesama penumpang dalam kereta api tersebut. . author: popcorn__shrimp
comment: The Commuter - 12A - 1hr 45mins Shrimp Score: 🦐🦐🦐🦐🦐🍤(5.5) Eating system: 🦐= 1 , 🍤=0.5, 🍿=These go to 11 If there was ever an actor that has become 'what you see is what you get' it's Liam Neeson. You know it's going to contain some raw one on one violence, he'll be a cop or most likely an ex cop and he has to save some hostage/s from a certain situation.............. ..... ✅✅✅😂😜 He commutes to the big city and just lost his job and gets given a choice on the journey back that becomes the plot for the film 'Would you take $100k to help kill someone you have no connection with?' Well if you are Liam Neeson the answer is no. It's gritty, raw and really does leave you to the end before you grasp the whole plot which keeps it watchable. It's a churn out action film but if you are a fan then it's worth a watch but it's not going to win any awards. Worth putting the Shrimp on the barbie? 👎 #Movie #movies #moviereview #Moviereviews #film #films #moviedate #movienight #review #reviews #odeon #odeoncinema #limitless #cinema #bournemouthodeon #bh2 #thecommuter #liamneeson #verafarmiga #samneill #patrickwilson

author: chickenbroccolicinema
comment: L’UOMO SUL TRENO 🐔 Chicken! Io non ci riesco a dare il Broccolo all’amico Liam Naason. A parte che ho paura che poi mi squilla il telefono ed è lui che mi fa “CB io ti troverò. E ti apparecchierò in testa per mangiarci antipasto, primo, secondo, contorno, dolce, caffè, ammazzacaffè e amaro.” E poi perché a dire la verità mi divertono sinceramente i suoi gero-action, che ve devo di’. Questa volta Liam se la deve vedere con dei misteriosi individui che gli offrono 100.000 soldi per trovare una persona nel treno di pendolari che lui prende (ma allora sono prendolari🤔). Lui accetta l’offerta ma quando tenta di tirarsi indietro scopre che questi erano dei farabutti... c’avrai pure un bel naso ma in quanto a fiuto per i guai Liam stai messo maluccio eh. Per fortuna non c’è nulla che un marcantonio di 2 metri con le mani larghe come vanghe non possa risolvere con due pizzoni. C’è meno action del solito, anche per l’ambiente un po’ ristretto dei vagoni, anche se non manca il combattimento in piano sequenza sborone. Mi raccomando salite sul treno lasciando a casa la ricerca di credibilità, altrimenti andate a fare trainspotting a Cinisello Balsamo e non rompete quando la gente vola da un vagone all’altro in corsa prendendo esattamente la porticina mentre io di solito quando devo andare alla carrozza ristorante mi cago sottissimo quando passi in mezzo tra uno e l’altro che trema tutto. Vale sempre la regola: se salite su un aereo, su un autobus, su una nave o su un treno e ci trovate #liamneeson ... SCENDETE SUBITO! #luomosultreno #pendolari #action #actress #verafarmiga #train #thecommuter #cinema #movie #review #recensione #azione #jaumecolletserra

author: ucicinemas.pt
comment: The Commuter - O Passageiro - Em exibição nos cinemas UCI. Neste intenso thriller de acção, Liam Neeson é Michael, um vendedor de seguros que vê a sua viagem diária para o emprego transformar-se numa série de reviravoltas bem fora da rotina. Depois de ser abordado por um misterioso estranho, Michael é forçado a desvendar a identidade de um passageiro escondido algures no seu comboio antes que este chegue à última paragem. À medida que luta contra o tempo para resolver este puzzle, Michael vai-se apercebendo que um mortífero plano se está a desenrolar e que ele está inadvertidamente preso no centro da conspiração criminosa, que coloca em perigo a sua vida e a segurança dos restantes passageiros. THE COMMUTER – O PASSAGEIRO assinala o regresso da dupla Jaume Collet-Serra, na realização e Liam Neeson num novo grande papel de ação. O elenco conta ainda com Vera Farmiga, Patrick Wilson, Sam Neil, Elizabeth McGovern e Jonathan Banks. Título original: The Commuter Data: 2018; Origem: Reino Unido, Estados Unidos da América; Género: Ação, Thriller; 104 Min. Realização: Jaume Collet-Serra Argumento: Byron Willinger, Philip de Blasi Produção: Ombra Films, StudioCanal, The Picture Company Elenco: Liam Neeson, Vera Farmiga, Patrick Wilson, Sam Neill, Elizabeth McGovern, Jonathan Banks Mais informações e bilhetes em: http://ucicinemas.pt/Filmes/the-commuter---o-passageiro Trailer: https://youtu.be/CaBfln2x4H0 IMDB: http://www.imdb.com/title/tt1590193/ #Estreia #Cinema #Filmes #UCICinemas #TheCommuter #OPassageiro

author: celuloideshow
comment: 🚨🚨 RECOMENDACIÓN CELULOSA 🚨🚨 The Commuter / El Pasajero es un thriller de acción franco-británico-estadounidense dirigido por Jaume Collet-Serra, y escrito por Byron Willinger y Philip de Blasi. Protagonizada por Liam Neeson, Vera Farmiga, Sam Neill, Elizabeth McGovern, Jonathan Bancos, y Patrick Wilson. La película fue estrenada en los Estados Unidos el 12 de enero de 2018, por Lionsgate, y en el Reino Unido el 19 de enero de 2018, por StudioCanal. OPINIÓN PERSONAL | 👨🏻‍💻 Para mi una gran película sin desperdicio alguno, si que en algunos momentos es un poco lenta y aburre pero en muy pocos y son quizás necesarios para prepararte para lo que viene luego, solo digo que la recomiendo y espero que les guste. #ElPasajero #TheCommuter #Movie #Película #Acción #Thriller #OpiniónPersonal #EnEstreno #LiamNeeson #Actor #RecomendaciónCelulosa #CeluloideShow

comment: '테이큰'의 데쟈뷰, 이제 그만~ 테이큰에서 딸을 구하고, 런 올 나이트에선 아들을 구하고, 언노운에선 자신의 기억을 구하고, 논스톱에선 비행기 승객들을 구하고, 이번엔 기차 승객들을 구하는 앵그리 니슨 52! 중요한 사람이 기차에 탔으니 죽여달라는 의문에 메세지를 받고 어안이 벙벙~상태로 승객들을 구하는데 어딘지 모르게 테이큰 스멜이 풍긴다. 딱 봐도 별거 없다. 그냥 형식적인 리암 니슨 형님표 액션영화이다. 찾아서 악당들을 뚜가맞고 죽이고 사람들을 구하는 니슨 형님.. 이 분 최소 슈퍼히어로급이다. 그래도 단서 찾는 재미는 있었더라도, '테이큰', '논스톱', '런 올 나이트'등 반복적인 액션으로 스토리 전개와 액션들과 배경의 형태 등 거기서 거기. 즉, 도찐개찐이다. 식상하다. 니슨 형님 올해 60넘은 나이로 액션을 하니 내가 봐도 버거워 보인다 ㅠㅠ 형님 이제 그만하시죠? 다행히 마지막이라 하는데... 근데 왠지 또 불안하다 😐 역시 킬링타임으론 적합하고 암튼 니슨 형님한테 걸리면 무조건 좆되는기여ㅋㅋ 근데 악당들은 그걸 알면서도 니슨 형님한테 지랄을 한다 ㅋㅋ 역시 세상엔 멍청한 놈들이 참 많다. 아, 그리고 '컨져링' 워랜 부부도 나온다 오옿~🙊 . #커뮤터 #TheCommuter #LionsgateFilms #리암니슨 #베라파미가 #패트릭윌슨 #샘닐 #플로렌스퓨 #자움콜렛세라 #Action #Commuter #Train #Kill #City #IWillFindYouAndIWillKillYou #GoodLuck #기차 #통근자 #단서 #앵그리니슨52 #널찾아서죽일것이다 . #무비스타그램 #Movie #일상 #Dailystagram #InstaMovie

author: ala.nusantara
comment: Film Trailer Liam Neeson paling "?" (tanda tanya) . Liam Neeson tidak jadi pensiun, ia kembali dlm film The Commuter.. . Di tulang yg tdk muda lgi, ia tak kapok beraksi benturan di kereta, berfikir berat memecahkan teka-teki berdurasi dibayangi ancaman keluaragnya akan dibunuh. . Kemampuan dn Ketajaman inteligensia sbg mantan ditektif polisi ia kerahkan sekuat tenaga. Demi memenuhi keinginan perempuan misterius, mencari saksi pembunuhan. diperankan oleh Vera Farmiga. . Gerbong kereta sbg setting film bergenre trailer ini sangat cerdas. Membantu menambah efek ketegangan dan garis waktu yg cepat... Penonton diajak berfikir menebak nebak, diajak menganalisa. . Di film ini Neeson berkolaborasi lagi untuk ke-empat kalinya dengan sutradara "langganannya", Jaume Collet-Serra. Mereka sebelumnya telah bekerjasama di film Unknown, Non-Stop dan Run All Night. . Melihat akhir film, spertinya Neeson menarik kembali niatnya untk pensiun.. . @infofilm.id @pecinta_film @bioskop #liamneeson #thecommuter #movie #gerbongkereta #keretaapi #filmbagus

author: scoopofcinema
comment: The Commuter (action) Liam Neeson does what Liam Neeson does best... take down bad guys and be a super-bad bad-a. As an ex-cop, he encounters a strange lady on his normal commute home. He goes along with it at first, without knowing exactly what it will entail. Liam is great, obvi, but the movie isn’t really anything special. Although I will say the story was not predictable in any way, which was a nice surprise. My favorite parts were probably the VERY well choreographed fight sequences. Those were really cool. The Commuter is cool, and if you’re into Liam’s movies, you’ll definitely enjoy it. Genre score (action): 8 Overall score: 6 #scoopofcinema #moviereview #thecommuter #thecommutermovie #regalmovies

author: doisjelevoir
comment: Petit voyage dans un train de la Banlieue New Yorkaise avec The Passenger. Pour ce Thriller-Action, le réalisateur espagnol Jaume Collet-Serra va retrouver son acteur phare Liam Neeson. Et le moins que l’on puisse dire c’est que cette fois l’alchimie ne fonctionnera pas. On part sur une histoire assez basique. Un homme qui vient de se faire licencier rentre chez lui part un train de banlieue. Une femme s’assoie à côté de lui et lui propose de l’argent en échange d’un petit service. Un choix qui fera basculer la vie de Michael MacCauley. Le casting a beau être intéressant, notamment avec le duo de Conjuring (Vera Farmiga & Patrick Wilson), cela ne compense pas un scénario beaucoup trop prévisible. J’aurai aimé plus de retournement de situation dans une trame qui se devine assez rapidement. De plus, un événement survenant vers la fin vous fera logiquement penser : « Mais en réalité tout ce qui vient de s’écouler été inutile ». Certes, il y a une belle tentative pour compenser ça par un rythme assez soutenu. Et je dois le reconnaitre je ne me suis pas du tout ennuyé durant le film. Mais malheureusement … les scènes d’action sont vraiment improbable. C’est donc avec un sentiment plutôt négatif que je suis sorti de la salle. Ma critique plus détaillée disponible sur ma chaîne YouTube en lien dans ma biographie. #ThePassenger #TheCommuter #LiamNeeson #JaumeColletSerra #Film #Critique #Cinema

author: quyen.little.things
comment: [ Review phim chiếu rạp - The Commuter/ Hành khách bí ẩn ] . Lý do đầu tiên để xem phim này là vì diễn viên chính trong phim là Liam Neeson - một trong những diễn viên nước ngoài mình yêu thích từ hồi còn xem Taken. Thực sự là bản thân không mấy xem phim US-UK nên nhớ được tên và yêu thích một diễn viên nào đó thì cũng là rất hiếm 😂 . Cảm nhận về phim The Commuter khá trọn vẹn và ổn. Các tình tiết, các nhân vật và cách xử lý tình huống cũng trôi chảy. Để mà nói thì đoạn đầu khá dễ nhàm chán và hơi buồn ngủ chút do nó phác hoạ lại daily life của diễn viên chính cộng thêm bối cảnh chính trong tàu điện nên có chút tối. Một số cảnh nguy hiểm như đánh nhau hay suýt chết cũng hơi sợ chút 😅 . Vẫn nhớ câu nói "What kind of person are you" - phải chọn lựa giữa tính mạng của những người thân yêu trong gia đình hoặc của những hành khách xa lạ trên chuyến tàu quả không dễ. Nhưng hãy cứ tin rằng công lý luôn chiến thắng. . Lâu mới xem được một bộ phim chiếu rạp mà khá ưng. Cũng có tình tiết điều tra suy luận nên cũng gây tò mò chút. Sau một thời gian xem ma quỷ với trinh thám thì thể loại này lại khiến mình hứng thú.

author: ggwp_pop
comment: 上了大學之後真的很少跑電影院了，以前有事沒事都跟朋友跑哈拉，跟人約出門也大多是跑電影院。 現在很多電影都是改編或續集電影，再不然就是舊片重拍，原創劇本的好電影真的越來越少，會驅使我看完預告片後馬上衝電影院的電影也越來越少了。之前看到【疾速救援】的電影海報，片名跟連恩尼遜讓我直接聯想到【空中救援】跟即刻救援系列（片商們能夠想些有創意一點的片名嗎？），很喜歡推理類型的電影，所以當下就決定要去刷這部。 看完後的感想跟預期差不多，劇情包含著懸疑推理的氛圍，再用些許的動作戲來點綴其中，最後的緊張感跟高潮部分也做得很棒，重點就是連恩尼遜真的太帥了，高大的身影、渾厚的嗓音、銳利的眼神和俐落的身手，最帥的老人非他莫屬(雖然我媽一直堅持是史恩康納萊)。 話說官方釋出了很多風格酷炫的電影海報，但台灣就一定要用最low的那款(因為連恩尼遜的臉最清楚)覺得可惜 #疾速救援 #thecommuter #liamneeson

author: ucni3527
comment: #커뮤터 #영화 #액션 #thecommuter #liamneeson #리암니슨 #베라파미가 #패트릭윌슨 #샘닐 #조나단뱅크 #딘찰스채프먼 #플로렌스퓨 _ 힘을 많이 뺀 액션 영화. 화려한 액션은 없었지만 가볍게 즐기기 딱 괜찮은 킬링타임 액션 오락 영화. 가족의 목숨을 담보로 통근열차라는 제한된 공간에서 얼굴도 알지못하는 사람을 찾아야만하는 미션. 리암 니슨의 가족은 세계 최고 극한 직업이야.ㅠㅠ _ 영화 도입 부분. 항상 똑같은 시간. 똑같은 통근 열차. 익숙한 사람들. 시간의 흐름속에 큰 변화없이 반복되는 일상을 보여주는 영상에서 세심한 영화구나.라는 생각이 들었다. 중간 기차표를 확인하는 장면도 그렇고 오!!라는 말이 절로 나온 엔딩크레딧까지. 작은 부분까지 신경쓴 티가 나는 영화였다. _ 달리는 열차안에서 자신의 모든 행동을 알고 있는 의문의 여성이 이떻게 자신을 지켜보고 있는지? 경찰 후배와의 통화는 왜 막지않는지? 에 대한 의문을 주인공이 갖지않는다는게 이상한 부분이긴했지만 자신이 찾아야만하는 그 사람을 찾아내는 과정과 지켜내는 과정을 볼만했다. _ 주인공 혼자만의 영움담이기보단 사람들이 함께 그 사람을 지키려했던 모습은 뻔한듯 하지만 훈훈했던 장면. 사람들 착해. 좋은 사람들. 혼자 외로이 사투하던 리암 니슨도 이젠 사람들의 도움도 받을때가 되었다. _ 그사람이 등장하는 순간. 저 사람 악당이야! 라는 생각이 절로 들만큼 판에 박힌 캐스팅이 영화의 긴장감을 떨어트리긴했지만 통근열차의 문이 닫기는 순간부터 그사람을 찾기위한 리암 니슨의 모습만으로도 충분히 재미있었던 영화. 커뮤터. 돈의 유혹이라는게 이렇게 무서운것!!! 눈 먼 돈에는 손대지 맙시다!! _ #1월24일개봉 #절찬상영중 #관람후기 #주절주절 #횡설수설 #내생각 #리뷰 #영화는개취

author: movies_of_the_future
comment: Movies of the Future: Weekend Box-Office Results 1: Jumanji ($19.5M) 2: 12 Strong ($15.8M) 3: Den of Thieves ($15.2M) 4: The Post ($11.7M) 5: Greatest Showman ($10.6M) The past, weekend Jumanji reigned supreme for the fourth weekend in a row beating out the two newcomers. Jumanji is racing towards $800M worldwide, as has already become Sony's highest grossing (non Spiderman) movie in America. 12 Strong beat Den Of Thieves but both performed miserably as stars Chris Hemsworth and Gerard Butler prove they can't match box-office results from their bigger franchises (Thor and Has Fallen, respectively). The Post had an impressive hold as it passes $50M worldwide, but not a good as hold as The Greatest Showman with 14%, crossing $200M worldwide. Paddington 2 also had a strong hold of under 30% but is lacking behind its predecessor sadly. Proud Mary suffered a huge 60% drop, as all the awards movies has decent holds.

author: cautionspoilers
comment: The Commuter ⭐️⭐️⭐️ : A cautionary tale about talking to strangers on public transport, imagine “Train to Busan” but with only one mad, staring-eyed person spattered with blood, and that’s Liam Neeson. This is Snakes On A Train, where you’re not sure who the snakes are. And yes I liked it. Totally batshit, ignore the plotholes and just enjoy the terrific action sequences. Review at bit.ly/commutermovie or cautionspoilers.com ‪#thecommuter #thecommuterreview #liamneeson #verafarmiga #trains #commuting #filmreview #moviereview #actionfilm‬ @thecommuterfilm

author: jeon_jihye89
comment: 오늘의 두 번째 영화, <커뮤터>🎬 - 선착순 이벤트 까먹어서 VIP 평일관람권으로 대신 관람.. 알림해두던지 적어놔야지 원😂 - 무튼 액션 더 이상 안 찍으신댔는데 또 액션으로 컴백하셔서 읭..?🤔스러웠지만 뭔가 의리로 봐 드려야할 것 같은 리암옹 영화ㅎㅎ 리암 표 액션이라는 장르로 분류해도 되것어요 아즈씨.. 아니 할아버진가... 암만 전직 경찰이라도 글치 기억력이 너무 과하게 좋은 거 아닙니까ㅋㅋ 애초에 러시아워였던 그 통근열차에서 얼굴도 이름도 모르는 사람을 밑도 끝도 없이 우째 찾는대냐.. 그래도 내 나이가 60이라던 대사에 맞기도 엄청 맞으시고 힘에 부쳐보이던 액션씬에선 그간의 세월을 느낄 수 있어서 뭔가 애잔ㅠㅠㅠ 그나저나 <컨저링>의 패트릭 윌슨, 베라 파미가 둘 다 나와서 느낌 묘하더라는ㅎㅎ 그래서 결국 해고당한 리암 아저씨 이용해 먹은 것들은 정체가 뭐였던겨? 조직명도 안 나오고 '고결'만 중얼거리다 흐지부지..😕 마지막 짤은 <레이디 맥베스>의 플로렌스 퓨!! 나오는지 모르다가 뒤늦게 알아채고 깜짝 놀랐던😲😲 <랜드 오브 마인>의 심성 착한 군인이었던 #로랜드몰러 (롤란 뮐레르라고도 표기하던데 뭐가 맞는지는 잘..😅) 배우도 반가웠고ㅎㅎ #영화 #무비스타그램 #커뮤터 #자움콜렛세라 #리암니슨 #베라파미가 #패트릭윌슨 #샘닐 #플로렌스퓨 #엘리자베스맥거번 #조나단뱅스 #앤디나이맨 #thecommuter #liamneeson #verafarmiga #patrickwilson #samneill #florencepugh #elizabethmcgovern #jonathanbanks #rolandmoller #andynyman

author: jan_giessmann
comment: Am Montag war ich in dem Film "The Commuter" 🚆🍿🎞️📽️mit einem meiner Lieblingsschauspieler Liam Neeson. Hier mal meine Kurzmeinung: Zu Liam Neeson muss man nicht viel sagen. Ich hatte Phasenweise Angst vor und Mitleid mit ihm. Es ist mal wieder genau die Rolle, die er spielen muss. Die Story selbst ist deutlich spannender als erwartet, hat einige Wendungen, ist super inszeniert und spannend. Man kann die ganze Zeit miträtseln. Erst wen er sucht, dann wer der böse ist. Außer man ist mit meiner Freundin im Kino - die wusste nach etwa 10 Minuten (nach dem im Trailer angeschnittenen Angebot) bescheid. Und sie behielt recht. Wie immer. Allerdings war das auch mein erster Gedanken. Den Film kann man sich auf jeden Fall im Kino ansehen, ich war durchgehend gut unterhalten (obwohl die ersten 20 Minuten nur Charakteraufbau war) und die Inszenierung schreit nach riesiger Leinwand und Popcorn.🍿 Viel spaß ☺️ Und wenn ihr den Film gesehen habt, schreibt mir eure Meinung dazu. Würde mich freuen🙂 #kino #film #thecommuter #filmkritik #empfehlung #autorenleben #popcorn #guterfilm #actionfilm #kinofilm #kinoabend #cinema #thriller
